About this app
arrow_forward
Welcome to the ultimate hub for programmers - the GeeksforGeeks app!
Join our thriving community of over a million geeks who are mastering programming languages, preparing for competitive exams, and gaining insights from top company interviews.
With 20,000+ programming questions, 40,000+ articles, and interview experiences from leading companies like Google, Amazon, and Microsoft, there's something for everyone, from beginners to experts.
üåü Key Features:
üéØ Personalized Feed: Enjoy content tailored to your interests, ensuring you stay engaged and informed.
üîç Powerful Search: Effortlessly find data structures, algorithms, and computer science topics to suit your needs.
ü§ù Download Courses - You can now download the course videos in your app and continue watching in offline mode
üì∞ Stay Updated: Keep your knowledge up-to-date with the latest articles on popular topics.
üöÜ Offline Reading: Download articles and courses for learning on-the-go, even without an internet connection.
üéì Interview Experiences: Learn from others' experiences in interviews at top companies and boost your chances of landing your dream job.
üåô Night Mode: Reduce eye strain and enhance your late-night study sessions with this user-friendly feature.
‚úÖ Quizzes: Assess your understanding with multiple-choice questions spanning various courses and topics.
üìò Comprehensive Topic Coverage:
üìö Data Structures (Array, Linked List, Stack, Queue, Binary Tree, etc.)
üîß Algorithms (Searching, Sorting, Dynamic Programming, etc.)
üíª Programming Languages (C, C++, Java, Python, PHP, JavaScript, and more)
üéìEntrance Exam Preparations GATE, UGC NET, ISRO, Aptitude
üñ•Ô∏è Computer Science Subjects (Operating Systems, Computer Networks, DBMS, etc.)
üìù Language Tutorials (C Programming, Java, PHP, HTML, CSS, SQL, and more)
üß† Advanced Computer Subjects (Machine Learning, Security, Digital Image Processing, etc.)
üè¢ Company-Specific Interview Preparation (Amazon, Google, Microsoft, Facebook, etc.)
üß© Puzzles, Quizzes, MCQs
üåê GBlog (technology-related articles)
Empower yourself with the skills and knowledge to excel in the world of programming and computer science ‚Äì download the GeeksforGeeks app now and take your career and knowledge to new heights!

Oct 12, 2024

Geeksforgeeks not a good place to get started with programming
I have seen many people recommending GeeksforGeeks to get started with programming.
But the truth is, many article is very poorly written, along with poor UI/UX design.
From what I have seen, Its just a place where code from different website and books are copied and compiled on a single website.
Let's just take example of method 4.
https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/check-whether-two-strings-are-anagram-of-each-other/
It's been a year since the method 4 has not been removed, this was one such code I found out today.
https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/length-of-longest-subarray-in-which-elements-greater-than-k-are-more-than-elements-not-greater-than-k/?ref=rp
-Wrong approach
https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/longest-subarray-count-1s-one-count-0s/?ref=rp
-  Logically incorrect.
Many article with wrong time complexity, slow approach, poor explanation have just ruined the quality of content.
Would not recommend GeeksforGeeks.

üôè
If you've got an ingenious solution or any questions, discussions, or insights regarding today's "Problem of the Day" solution, feel free to join our vibrant
discussion hub
. We eagerly await your input and strive to cultivate an environment where learning flourishes through collaboration. Let's dive in together!
Welcome to the repository containing solutions for the GeeksforGeeks (GFG) Problem of the Day for the year 2024.
Table of Contents
Introduction
Languages Used
Directory Structure
How To Use This Repository?
Contribution Guidelines
Introduction
Why explore this repository?
Daily Practice
: Practice makes perfect. By reviewing these solutions daily, you can enhance your problem-solving skills and programming techniques.
Diverse Topics
: The problems cover a wide range of topics including algorithms, data structures, dynamic programming, mathematics, and more. This variety helps you broaden your understanding of different concepts.
Learning from Solutions
: Understanding various solution approaches is crucial for becoming a better programmer. Each solution in this repository comes with detailed explanations to help you grasp the underlying logic.
Community Collaboration
: Feel free to contribute your own solutions or suggest improvements to existing ones. Collaboration fosters learning and helps in building a stronger programming community.
How To Use This Repository?
Navigation
: Explore the directory to find solutions for each daily problem. The problems are organized chronologically, making it easy to locate specific ones.
Understanding Solutions
: Take your time to understand the logic behind each solution. If you encounter any difficulties, don't hesitate to ask for clarification or seek additional resources.
Experimentation
: After understanding a solution, try modifying it or implementing it in a different programming language. Experimentation reinforces your understanding and improves your coding versatility.
Engage with the Community
: Share your insights, ask questions, or discuss alternative solutions with fellow programmers. Collaboration accelerates learning and fosters a supportive environment.
Feel free to use, modify, or learn from these solutions
: If you find any issues or improvements, please follow the
Contribution Guidelines
to contribute.
Languages Used
C++
Python
Java
Directory Structure
The repository is organized into folders, each representing a specific GeeksforGeeks problem. Inside each folder, you'll find the solution file(s) and any additional resources.
Contribution Guidelines
If you'd like to contribute:
Fork the repository.
Create a new branch for your feature or bug fix.
Make changes and commit them.
Submit a pull request, explaining the changes you made.
Please ensure your code follows the existing coding style and includes appropriate comments.
Start Exploring!
To begin your journey through the GeeksforGeeks Problem of the Day solutions for 2024, simply browse through the directory and select a problem that interests you. Happy coding!
Visit GeeksforGeeks Problem of the Day
About
Welcome to the vibrant world of GeeksforGeeks Daily Problem of the Day solutions! Dive into a treasure trove of daily challenges meticulously crafted to sharpen your problem-solving skills. With diverse topics, detailed explanations, and a supportive community, this repository is your gateway to mastering algorithms, data structures, and more.
